messagebundle.msg: Unable to parse the gadget XML file.
Verify that your gadget XML is valid and well-formed. Check for missing XML syntax and try again.
XML declaration must exist on the first line of your gadget XML.
All gadgets must have a valid XML declaration at the very first line. Add <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> to the top of your gadget XML.
Author attribute is missing or undefined.

Add the author attribute under <ModulePrefs> and assign it your name.
For example: <ModulePrefs author="your name"></ModulePrefs>
Author email attribute is invalid or undefined.

Add the author_email attribute under <ModulePrefs> and assign a valid email address.
For example: <ModulePrefs author_email="user@gmail.com"></ModulePrefs>
Height attribute is missing or undefined.

Add the height attribute under <ModulePrefs> and assign it a valid number representing the gadget height.
For gadget ads, the width and height must conform to a valid AdSense Ad Format.
Width attribute is missing or undefined.

Add the width attribute under <ModulePrefs> and assign it a valid number representing the gadget width.
For gadget ads, the width and height must conform to a valid AdSense Ad Format.
Title attribute is missing or undefined.

Add a title attribute under <ModulePrefs> and assign it a valid String representing the title of your gadget.

For example: <ModulePrefs title="my gadget title">
Description attribute is missing or undefined.

Add the description attribute under <ModulePrefs> and assign it a valid String containing a brief description of what your gadget does and how to use it.

For example: <ModulePrefs description="This gadget does X, Y, Z.">
Thumbnail attribute is missing or contains an invalid value.
Add a thumbnail attribute under <ModulePrefs> and assign it a valid absolute URL pointing to your gadget's thumbnail image.
Content type must be set to "html".

Google Gadget Ads are required to be type="html". Set the content type of your gadget to "html".

For example: <Content type="html">
Scrolling attribute must be defined and set to "false".
Add the scrolling attribute under <ModulePrefs> and assign it a value of 'false'. This prevents scrollbars from appearing in your gadget when content overflows past the specified height.
Gadget dimensions must conform to a valid AdSense Ad Format.
Verify that your gadget's width and height values match one of the supported AdSense Ad Formats.
Clickthrough tracking UserPref must be defined.

Gadget ads are required to specify a clickurl UserPref in the XML. Add this required UserPref to your gadget XML:
<UserPref name="clickurl" datatype="hidden" default_value=""/>

The clickurl UserPref is required to enable clickthrough tracking in your gadget.
Interaction tracking UserPref must be defined.

Gadget ads are required to specify a aiturl UserPref in the XML. Add this required UserPref to your gadget XML:
<UserPref name="aiturl" datatype="hidden" default_value=""/>

The aiturl UserPref is required to enable interaction tracking in your gadget.
<Require feature="ads"/> is missing from your gadget XML.

Add <Require feature="ads"/> as a child element under <ModulePrefs> in your gadget XML.
This enables the use of gadget ad specific methods to enable features such as clickthrough and interaction tracking.
All embedded assets must be cached.

Some images and Flash assets in your gadget are not being cached on Google servers. In order to handle the high volume traffic your gadget ad will receive, you must cache all assets.

See more information about this topic.
Total downloaded file size during the initial load must be less than 50KB.

Any embedded assets that are included during the initial load are summed up to calculate the total file size which must be less than 50KB.

See more information about this topic.
Clickthrough and/or interaction tracking is required.

No clickthrough or interaction tracking were detected in your gadget. In order to measure the success of your gadget ad campaign, you must implement at least one form of tracking. You can track either clickthroughs or user interactions. You'll be able to see tracking data for both types in your reports.

See more information on clickthrough tracking and interaction tracking.
All external URLs such as links, images, etc. must be valid.

The URLs listed below are invalid but are being used somewhere in your gadget. Please verify that each URL is valid and returns a successful response.

See the full list of editorial guidelines for gadget ads.
No cookies allowed to be set on impression.

Verify that your gadget or any embedded scripts aren't setting any cookies on impression.

See the full list of editorial guidelines for gadget ads.
Gadget XML must be UTF-8 encoded.
Check your gadget XML file for any special non-UTF-8 characters and remove them.
